name: Record Tool Use
description: Record a tool invocation during task execution. Captures tool name, input, output, and timestamp for debugging and analytics.

run_path.description: Path to the task run file (relative to current space)

tool_name.description: Name of the tool that was invoked

tool_input.description: Input parameters passed to the tool

tool_output.description: Optional output returned by the tool (truncated to 500 chars)

examples.expected_result: Tool use recorded with timestamp in task run
